title: Fire Fox Browser
content:
Hi,

I use fire fox as my default browser. It is still the default but now when I go to search the yahoo start page comes on. I cannot search with fire fox as this stupid yahoo home page over rides it. Please help!

Thanks Briony

abgardenrejuvenation@gmail.com
creator: abgardenrejuvenation

title: Forget about an FQDN?
content:
There’s right-click + “Forget about this site”, but that deletes the information for the entire second-level domain (say example.org).

When in the process of moving things from *.example.org to *.example.com peu à peu, then I need to be able to individually forget say chat.example.org because it’s already moved to chat.example.com but retain all information for other *.example.org hosts.
creator: mirabilos

title: Saba Security Plugin - Stop working
content:
Good morning, Our company's firefox add-on(Saba Security Plugin) has stopped working, please let me know what happened.

When a new client (version 126) downloads the add-on, the following message is displayed: "The add-on downloaded from this site cannot be installed because it appears corrupt."

If you install an older version, it works without any problems, what is the reason?

I have already contacted you once at: product-help@firefox.com

And they told me to report at: https://support.mozilla.org/questions/new/desktop/form

Regards,
creator: michal.kasprzak

title: How do I stop those actualization pop-ups for add-ons in Firefox?
content:
Hi, got a problem for the last several days - on each visited site Firefox (my guess) is launching a pop up about add-ons for Ad Blocks tham I am using were updated with official national filters for Polish market.

This is super annoying and the pop-up jumps on almost every new site bieng visited (it is visible for ca. 5 seconds). Is there any way to stop it? How can I dissable this feature?

Thanks, r.
creator: rafal.rybaltowski

title: Firefox shortcuts synchronisation
content:
Hi Firefox.

It is possible to synchronise an Firefox shortcuts for visiting pages, to another synchronised computer? (attachment)

Thanks

Peter
creator: klimope

title: Szinkronizáció
content: Nem rég telepítettem újra a windowst és miután letöltöttem a firefoxot és beléptem az accountomba nem találtam ott a korábbi mentéseimet (jelszó, előzmények, könyvjelzők stb.) Ezeknek ott kéne lennie, mert már korábban is működött.
creator: calildur

title: Input fields cannot be clicked in IFRAME
content:
Dear friends,

I am using Firefox Browser 127.0.2 (64-bit) on a PC.

Sometimes it happens that an input field on a page in an IFRAME cannot be clicked. The buttons work, but you can't enter anything in the text field.

Only when I press in the address bar and then in the text field, now I can enter text in the text field.

Example page https://www.fantastic-food.ch Then click on the "Feedbacks" link.

Does anyone have an idea?

Kind regards Uwe

Translated with DeepL.com (free version)
creator: haller-mtl

title: Cannot use Dropdown on Calendar Widget
content: Cannot use the hours dropdown on Calendar Widget in Mozilla, when I click on the hours, the dropdown appears for half a second and then dissapears, so I cannot use it. Works fine with Edge and Chromium. OS Ubuntu 24.04. Tried private mode and disabling add-ons - only one I have is UBlock. When inspecting the console does not show any errors.
creator: simeon.panov95

title: about:config option to allow a redirect to the file:// protocol?
content:
Sometime in the last few months, Firefox (Developer Edition) stopped allowing redirects and links to file://-protocol URLs. Is there a way to re-enable this for my personal browser, e.g. via about:config or the like?

Thanks!
creator: jfriedl

title: Default search engine does not get imported from profile, resets to google
content: after creating a new profile, and copying everything in the root directory to the new profile, including search.json.mozlz4, the default search engine setting does not get transferred over and is still set to google
creator: ducky

title: Youtube Reduced Quality
content:
about a month ago youtube was only letting me watch videos in 720 or 360, as of about a week ago i only have 360. i've disabled every single extension i have and i have firefox version 127.0.2.

i'm not having this issue in edge, so i assume it's firefox specific. anyone know what's going on or what i can do?
creator: knkramer

title: Firefox No Longer Opens Up
content: I just got my PC back from the shop. It's the best LG Gram laptop they had with Windows 11, and it's 1-yr old. Much on it was corrupted and I'm having to reload many items, one being my Firefox. It wouldn't open up. I did the right-click on my mouse and hit the OPEN selection. Firefox still wouldn't open up. I reloaded Firefox hoping that it would correct whatever may be wrong. No, it still won't open up. I'm reaching you now via TOR. My TOR was also reinstalled, but it is able to open up. Can you think of what I may have done wrong? [I'm unable to check the option-email me when someone answers my thread {this email must be a thread}, but this will be fine.] Please note that I am so NOT tech-savvy, I don't even have any smart/mobile/cell phone. Just a plain old phone. (I should add I'm in my 70's, ill, and in a Nursing Home.) I looked through your troubleshooting sugggestions, but they are too fancy for me to understand. I'm not sure how this works, but I sure do hope you can offer some suggestions as to what I can try. Thanks so very much for your time and consideration of this matter. It's very much appreciated.
creator: justsleeping33

title: How to delete no longer needed desktop icons (not the file, just the icon !  I've followed the online instructions to right click the icon and press delete. However, nothing happens, icon not deleted ! !
content: Please tell me how I can delete unused, unnecessary, icons from my desktop ! I've already tried right click & delete, but doesn't work !
creator: rrdandrea

title: how do i get spf so i can send email to gmail accounts
content: What do I need to send an email to a gmail account?????????????

content: When i try to load Firefox, it says Error Platform Version 127.0.1 is not compatible with minVersion <= 127.0 maxVersion <= 127.0
